title: Cities of Refuge and Legal Safeguards
summary: Deuteronomy 19 describes cities of refuge for people who kill accidentally. It also gives laws about witnesses and warns against false testimony, ensuring justice and fair trials.

faq.question: What was the purpose of cities of refuge?
faq.answer: To protect someone who accidentally killed another until a fair trial could be held.

faq.question: What happened to false witnesses?
faq.answer: They would receive the punishment they tried to bring on the accused.
